import React, {useEffect} from 'react'; import $ from "jquery"; const Pillblock =(props)=>{ useEffect(() => { $(".pill-row *").animate({transition: "all"}, 5000, 'linear'); $(".pill-row *").animate({transform: "scale(1)"}, 5000, 'linear'); }, []) return(
) } export default Pillblock;
